Different Crime.Crime Name: Discrimination under the Canadian Human Rights Act
procedural_fairness: The Commission must adhere to procedural fairness
jurisdictional_issue: investigator relied heavily on the PSC report, which lacked jurisdiction over discrimination claims
reasonableness_of_decision: Dismissal decisions are reviewed for reasonableness unless a jurisdictional error occurs
judicial_review_process: Judicial review analyzed whether the Commission's dismissal of the complaint was reasonable and procedurally fair
decision_outcome: Case remanded to the Commission for further investigation addressing omitted issues
